column4: Hi, I keep getting this error : Cannot create /media/STORAGE/Spider-Man.3.2007.NTSC.DVDR-CuriousJotos/cj-sm3-dvdr.nfo: No such file or directory
when downloading with ktorrent
its formatted to NTFS
apt-get install ntfs-3g ?
1sec
I'll have to use synaptic as I'm not logged on as root
you should never be logged in as root.
I know that IndyGunFreak but I couldn't use terminal for some reason
it said locked or something
sigh....
silly man
sorry guys
you probably had something open(like synaptic), that was using root access, one root access priv. at a time
!ask | multiverse
bear with me, as  I finally installed ubuntu for the first time on my desktop :D I've only been using live cd's and the onyl time I ever used ubuntu is on my gameserver.
only*
I picked up a 500GB hdd today
put everything on that, and put ubuntu on my second hard-drive.
I hate grub with a passion, and partitions for that matter. It kept screwing me over IndyGunFreak I lost all my data when I installed SuSE 10.
then that was your own fault, should have backedup
I know it was, now I have learned from my mistake and have obtained an external.
kbrooksthats what we specialize in, ask your question
I leave windows on one drive and ubuntu on another, problem solved.
i guess we all have to learn at some point... at least you apparently learned your lesson
